entry.data:
RAIN WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

RAIN
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN AND SNOW LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 14
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
LOWS AROUND 15

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 50 PERCENT

SNOW LIKELY
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
CHANCE OF SNOW 70 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS ZERO AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS 15 TO 20
LOWS AROUND ZERO
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 20
LOWS AROUND 5 ABOVE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
